abstract: Community leaders in Los Angeles intent on reviving Los Angeles River have reacted with outrage to news that LA River Revitalization Corporation enlisted architect Frank Gehry to create plan for river's revival; feel that Gehry embodies possibility that revival project will be exploited by gentrification.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gehry’s involvement has prompted stinging criticism from advocates wary of gentrification and skeptical of the architect’s ability to create an appealing outdoor space.

headline.main: Frank Gehry Draws Ire for Joining Los Angeles River Restoration Project
headline.print_headline: Acclaimed Architect Runs Into Skeptical Angelenos

snippet: Mr. Gehry’s involvement has prompted stinging criticism from advocates wary of gentrification and skeptical of the architect’s ability to create an appealing outdoor space.
